game.title: The Missing Sword
game.objective: Retrieve the missing sword from the Goblin King
game.description: The king's sword has been stolen by the Goblin King, and the king has asked you to retrieve it.
game.reward: The king's favor and a new sword

task.description: The Goblin Caves are located in the Dark Forest, south of the village.

task.objective: Defeat the Goblin King's right-hand man, Grimgor
task.description: Grimgor is a formidable guard; defeat him to progress.

task.objective: Search the Goblin King's throne room for the sword
task.description: The sword will be hidden there, so be careful.

task.objective: Return the sword to Queen Titania in the castle gardens
task.description: Deliver the sword to her and inform her of your success.
